src:
Apa yang Sebenarnya Terjadi di Balik Comeback Dramatis Chelsea vs Ajax Amsterdam?
07 Nov 2019, 13:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Christian Pulisic menjelaskan bagaimana Chelsea bisa mewujudkan comeback dramatis saat menahan imbang Ajax Amsterdam 4-4 di Liga Champions, Rabu (6/11/2019). Dia menyoroti pentingnya peran Frank Lampard di ruang ganti.
Pertandingan tersebut spesial dan akan selalu dikenal sebagai salah satu pertandingan paling gila di Liga Champions. Betapa tidak, The Blues sempat tertinggal 1-3, memburuk jadi 1-4, lalu tampil luar biasa untuk menyamakan kedudukan jadi 4-4.
Pada pertandingan gila seperti ini, taktik tidak terlalu penting. Mental pemain justru lebih berbicara. Perjuangan para pemain patut diapresiasi, mereka tak terpuruk meski tertinggal 1-4.
Apa yang sebenarnya terjadi pada tim Chelsea saat itu? Baca penjelasan Pulisic di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
What Actually Happened Behind Chelsea vs Ajax Amsterdam's Dramatic Comeback?
Nov 7 2019, 13:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Christian Pulisic explains how Chelsea can make a dramatic comeback while holding Ajax Amsterdam 4-4 in the Champions League on Wednesday (6/11/2019). He highlighted the important role of Frank Lampard in the dressing room.
These matches are special and will always be known as one of the craziest matches in the Champions League. Imagine, the Blues had left behind 1-3, deteriorated to 1-4, then appeared extraordinary to be equalized to 4-4.
In a crazy match like this, tactics don't really matter. Mental players are even more talking. The struggle of the players deserves to be appreciated, they did not fail even though they fell behind 1-4.
What actually happened to the Chelsea team at that time? Read the Pulisic explanation below, Bolaneters!
